entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Snow ending after midnight then cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 05 February 2023
